data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of edaphic mite (Acari: Mesostigmata: Eviphididae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Joharchi, Omid, Mašán, Peter, Babaeian, Esmaeil (2014): A new genus and species of edaphic mite (Acari: Mesostigmata: Eviphididae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3774 (3): 275-281, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.3.4
